title: A Royal Night Out
creator_credit: SCOPE Pictures, Ecosse Films, Filmgate Films, Kevin Hood, Julian Jarrold, Laurence Dorman, Claire Anderson, Trevor De Silva, Robert Bernstein and Douglas Rae
brief_description: The re-imagining of VE Day in 1945, when Princess Elizabeth and her sister, Margaret were allowed out from Buckingham Palace for the night to join in the celebrations, and encounter romance and danger.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

creator_credit_for_label: SCOPE Pictures, Ecosse Films, Filmgate Films, Kevin Hood, Julian Jarrold, Laurence Dorman, Claire Anderson, Trevor De Silva, Robert Bernstein and Douglas Rae
description: The re-imagining of VE Day in 1945, when Princess Elizabeth and her sister, Margaret were allowed out from Buckingham Palace for the night to join in the celebrations, and encounter romance and danger.
